name: Take That
description: Fast-paced Western shooting game, can quickly play the core content even if you only got 10 minutes break. Other fun patterns are added to the game to help you kill time when you don't know what to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
